name: DMT DMT Coarse Mini Diamond Whetstone
description: Combining a miniature diamond-embedded steel plate and a flip-open plastic handle, this sharpener is small enough to take anywhere. It is also very easy to use – a few light and controlled strokes will quickly sharpen and hone a knife blade to a keen edge.Made of micron diamonds, steel, and plastic.Ring for attaching to clips, keys, or mini carabiners.Length is 14cm open and 6.8cm closed.
